price: 71 lorsque, des carcans au cou et solidement enchaînés, ils seront traînés
arabic: إِذِ ٱلۡأَغۡلَٰلُ فِيٓ أَعۡنَٰقِهِمۡ وَٱلسَّلَٰسِلُ يُسۡحَبُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: idhi al-aghlālu fī aʿnāqihim wal-salāsilu yus'ḥabūna
